mapper.update: update banquet_reserve set combo_id=#{combo.id}, reservations_name=#{reservationsName}, reservations_sex=#{reservationsSex}, reservations_tel=#{reservationsTel}, reservations_num=#{reservationsNum}, reservations_start_time=#{reservationsStartTime}, remarks=#{remarks}, where id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into banquet_reserve (customer_id,combo_id, reservations_name, reservations_sex, reservations_tel, reservations_num, reservations_start_time, reserve_time,remarks) values(#{customer.id},#{combo.id},#{reservationsName}, #{reservationsSex},#{reservationsTel},#{reservationsNum},#{reservationsStartTime}, NOW(),#{remarks});
mapper.select: SELECT banquet_reserve.id, reservations_name, reservations_sex, reservations_tel, reservations_num, reservations_start_time, reserve_time, remarks, combo.id AS combo_id,combo_name,combo_price,combo_introduction, combo_classification,combo_sort FROM banquet_reserve LEFT JOIN combo ON combo.id=banquet_reserve.combo_id WHERE banquet_reserve.id=#{id}

SELECT banquet_reserve.id, reservations_name, reservations_sex, reservations_tel, reservations_num, reservations_start_time, reserve_time, remarks, combo.id AS combo_id,combo_name,combo_price,combo_introduction, combo_classification,combo_sort FROM banquet_reserve LEFT JOIN combo ON combo.id=banquet_reserve.combo_id WHERE banquet_reserve.customer_id=#{customerId}
